mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Nancy Halsted to Abby Chace,1878 May 3
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Halsted, Nancy Marsh, 1817-1891
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, to Abby Chace, Vice Regent for Rhode Island, May 3, 1878. Copy. Newark. Told Hollingsworth to proceed with Hall flooring. Gives measurements of Dining Room. Sideboard is original Washington presented by late Mrs. Lee. Found in attic in Alexandria in "forlorn condition." Mrs. Barnes had it scraped, varnished. New Jersey gives Rhode Island an India ink painting of Earl of Chatham. Refers to mirrors from Van Rensselaer family, stripes of black walnut border, broad stripe close to base. Hollingsworth's estimate for carpenter is $187.
